00146 int nfs_Mkdir( nfs_arg_t               * parg,    
00147                exportlist_t            * pexport, 
00148                fsal_op_context_t             * pcontext,   
00149                cache_inode_client_t    * pclient,
00150                hash_table_t            * ht,
00151                struct svc_req          * preq,    
00152                nfs_res_t               * pres ) 
00153 {
00154         static char     funcName[] = "nfs_Mkdir";
00155 
00156         char                    * str_dir_name = NULL  ;
00157         fsal_accessmode_t         mode = 0             ;
00158         cache_entry_t           * dir_pentry = NULL    ;
00159         cache_entry_t           * parent_pentry = NULL ;
00160   int                       rc = 0               ;
00161         fsal_attrib_list_t        parent_attr          ;
00162   fsal_attrib_list_t        attr                 ;
00163   fsal_attrib_list_t      * ppre_attr            ;
00164   fsal_attrib_list_t        attr_parent_after    ;
00165   cache_inode_file_type_t   parent_filetype      ;
00166   fsal_handle_t           * pfsal_handle         ;
00167   fsal_name_t               dir_name             ;
00168   cache_inode_status_t      cache_status         ;
00169   cache_inode_status_t      cache_status_lookup  ;
00170 
00171         if( preq->rq_vers == NFS_V3 )
00172         {
00173                 /* to avoid setting it on each error case */
00174                 pres->res_mkdir3.MKDIR3res_u.resfail.dir_wcc.before.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00175                 pres->res_mkdir3.MKDIR3res_u.resfail.dir_wcc.after.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00176                 ppre_attr = NULL;
00177         }
00178 
00179   if( ( parent_pentry = nfs_FhandleToCache( preq->rq_vers, 
00180                                             &(parg->arg_mkdir2.where.dir),
00181                                             &(parg->arg_mkdir3.where.dir),
00182                                             NULL, 
00183                                             &(pres->res_dirop2.status),
00184                                             &(pres->res_mkdir3.status),
00185                                             NULL,
00186                                             &parent_attr, 
00187                                             pcontext, 
00188                                             pclient, 
00189                                             ht, 
00190                                             &rc ) ) == NULL )
00191     {
00192       /* Stale NFS FH ? */
00193       return rc ;
00194     }
00195 
00196         /* get directory attributes before action (for V3 reply) */
00197   ppre_attr = &parent_attr ;
00198   
00199   /* Extract the filetype */
00200   parent_filetype = cache_inode_fsal_type_convert( parent_attr.type ) ;
00201   
00202         /*
00203          * Sanity checks: 
00204          */
00205         if( parent_filetype != DIR_BEGINNING &&  parent_filetype != DIR_CONTINUE )
00206         {
00207                 switch( preq->rq_vers )
00208                 {
00209                 case NFS_V2:
00210       pres->res_dirop2.status = NFSERR_NOTDIR;
00211       break;
00212       
00213                 case NFS_V3:
00214       pres->res_mkdir3.status = NFS3ERR_NOTDIR;
00215       break;
00216     }  
00217                 
00218                 return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00219         }
00220   
00221         switch( preq->rq_vers )
00222         {
00223         case NFS_V2:
00224     str_dir_name = parg->arg_mkdir2.where.name;
00225     
00226     if ( parg->arg_mkdir2.attributes.mode != (unsigned int) -1 )
00227     {
00228       mode = (fsal_accessmode_t)parg->arg_mkdir2.attributes.mode;
00229     }
00230     else
00231     {
00232       mode = (fsal_accessmode_t)0;      
00233     }
00234     break;
00235 
00236         case NFS_V3:
00237     str_dir_name = parg->arg_mkdir3.where.name;
00238     
00239     if (parg->arg_mkdir3.attributes.mode.set_it == TRUE)
00240       mode = (fsal_accessmode_t)parg->arg_mkdir3.attributes.mode.set_mode3_u.mode;
00241     else
00242       mode = (fsal_accessmode_t)0;
00243     break;
00244         }
00245 
00246   
00247         if( str_dir_name == NULL || strlen( str_dir_name ) == 0)
00248     {
00249       if( preq->rq_vers == NFS_V2 ) pres->res_dirop2.status = NFSERR_IO ;
00250       if( preq->rq_vers == NFS_V3 ) pres->res_mkdir3.status = NFS3ERR_INVAL ;
00251     } 
00252   else
00253     {
00254       /* Make the directory */
00255       if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_error_convert( FSAL_str2name( str_dir_name, 
00256                                                                      FSAL_MAX_NAME_LEN,
00257                                                                      &dir_name ) ) ) == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00258         {
00259           /*
00260            * Lookup file to see if it exists.  If so, use it.  Otherwise
00261            * create a new one.  
00262            */      
00263           dir_pentry = cache_inode_lookup( parent_pentry, 
00264                                            &dir_name, 
00265                                            &attr, 
00266                                            ht, 
00267                                            pclient, 
00268                                            pcontext,
00269                                            &cache_status_lookup ) ;
00270           
00271 
00272           if( cache_status_lookup == CACHE_INODE_NOT_FOUND )
00273             {
00274               /* Create the directory */
00275               if( ( dir_pentry = cache_inode_create( parent_pentry, 
00276                                                      &dir_name,
00277                                                      DIR_BEGINNING, 
00278                                                      mode, 
00279                                                      NULL, 
00280                                                      &attr,
00281                                                      ht, 
00282                                                      pclient, 
00283                                                      pcontext,
00284                                                      &cache_status ) ) != NULL )
00285                 {
00286                   /*
00287                    * Get the FSAL handle for this entry 
00288                    */
00289                   pfsal_handle =  cache_inode_get_fsal_handle( dir_pentry, 
00290                                                                &cache_status ) ;
00291                   
00292                   if( cache_status == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00293                     {
00294                       switch (preq->rq_vers)
00295                         {
00296                         case NFS_V2:
00297                           /* Build file handle */
00298                           if( !nfs2_FSALToFhandle( &(pres->res_dirop2.DIROP2res_u.diropok.file), pfsal_handle, pexport ) )
00299                             pres->res_dirop2.status = NFSERR_IO;
00300                           else
00301                             {
00302                               /*
00303                                * Build entry
00304                                * attributes 
00305                                */
00306                               if( nfs2_FSALattr_To_Fattr( pexport, &attr, 
00307                                                           &(pres->res_dirop2.DIROP2res_u.diropok.attributes) ) == 0 )
00308                                 pres->res_dirop2.status = NFSERR_IO;
00309                               else
00310                                 pres->res_dirop2.status = NFS_OK;
00311                             }
00312                           break ;
00313                           
00314                         case NFS_V3:
00315 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00316                           /* For debugging memory leaks */
00317                           BuddySetDebugLabel( "Filehandle V3 in nfs3_mkdir" ) ;
00318 #endif  
00319                           
00320                           /* Build file handle */ 
00321                           if( ( pres->res_mkdir3.MKDIR3res_u.resok.obj.post_op_fh3_u.handle.data.data_val = Mem_Alloc( NFS3_FHSIZE ) ) == NULL )
00322                             {
00323                               pres->res_mkdir3.status = NFS3ERR_IO ; 
00324                               return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00325                             }
00326                           
00327 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00328                           /* For debugging memory leaks */
00329                           BuddySetDebugLabel( "N/A" ) ;
00330 #endif   
00331                    
00332                           if( nfs3_FSALToFhandle( &pres->res_mkdir3.MKDIR3res_u.resok.obj.post_op_fh3_u.handle,
00333                                                   pfsal_handle, 
00334                                                   pexport ) == 0 )
00335                             {
00336                               Mem_Free( (char *)pres->res_mkdir3.MKDIR3res_u.resok.obj.post_op_fh3_u.handle.data.data_val ) ;
00337                               pres->res_mkdir3.status = NFS3ERR_INVAL;
00338                               return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00339                             }
00340                           else
00341                             { 
00342                               /* Set Post Op Fh3 structure */
00343                               pres->res_mkdir3.MKDIR3res_u.resok.obj.handle_follows = TRUE ;
00344                               pres->res_mkdir3.MKDIR3res_u.resok.obj.post_op_fh3_u.handle.data.data_len  =  sizeof( file_handle_v3_t ) ;
00345                                                             
00346                               /*
00347                                * Build entry
00348                                * attributes 
00349                                */
00350                               nfs_SetPostOpAttr( pcontext, pexport,
00351                                                  dir_pentry, 
00352                                                  &attr,
00353                                                  &(pres->res_mkdir3.MKDIR3res_u.resok.obj_attributes));
00354                           
00355                           
00356                               /* Get the attributes of the parent after the operation */
00357                               cache_inode_get_attributes( parent_pentry, &attr_parent_after ) ;
00358                               
00359                               /*
00360                                * Build Weak Cache
00361                                * Coherency data 
00362                                */
00363                               nfs_SetWccData( pcontext, pexport,
00364                                               parent_pentry, 
00365                                               ppre_attr, 
00366                                               &attr_parent_after,
00367                                               &(pres->res_mkdir3.MKDIR3res_u.resok.dir_wcc));
00368                               
00369                               pres->res_mkdir3.status = NFS3_OK;
00370                             }
00371                           
00372                           break ;
00373                         } 
00374                       return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00375                     }
00376                 }
00377             } /* If( cache_status_lookup == CACHE_INODE_NOT_FOUND ) */
00378           else
00379             {
00380               /* object already exists or failure during lookup */
00381               if( cache_status_lookup == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00382                 {
00383                   /* Trying to create a file that already exists */
00384                   cache_status =  CACHE_INODE_ENTRY_EXISTS ;
00385                   
00386                   switch (preq->rq_vers)
00387                     {
00388                     case NFS_V2:
00389                       pres->res_dirop2.status = NFSERR_EXIST ;
00390                       break;
00391                       
00392                     case NFS_V3:
00393                       pres->res_mkdir3.status = NFS3ERR_EXIST ;
00394                       break;
00395                     }
00396                 }
00397               else
00398                 {
00399                   /* Server fault */
00400                   cache_status = cache_status_lookup ;
00401 
00402                   switch (preq->rq_vers)
00403                     {
00404                     case NFS_V2:
00405                       pres->res_dirop2.status = NFSERR_IO ;
00406                       break;
00407                       
00408                     case NFS_V3:
00409                       pres->res_mkdir3.status = NFS3ERR_INVAL ;
00410                       break;
00411                     }
00412                 }
00413               
00414               nfs_SetFailedStatus( pcontext, pexport,
00415                                    preq->rq_vers, 
00416                                    cache_status,
00417                                    &pres->res_dirop2.status,
00418                                    &pres->res_mkdir3.status,
00419                                    NULL, NULL,
00420                                    parent_pentry,
00421                                    ppre_attr,
00422                                    &(pres->res_mkdir3.MKDIR3res_u.resfail.dir_wcc),
00423                                    NULL, NULL, NULL);
00424               
00425               return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00426             }
00427         }
00428     }
00429   
00430         /* If we are here, there was an error */
00431         if( nfs_RetryableError( cache_status ) )
00432     {
00433       return NFS_REQ_DROP ;
00434       
00435     }
00436         nfs_SetFailedStatus( pcontext, pexport,
00437                        preq->rq_vers, 
00438                        cache_status,
00439                        &pres->res_dirop2.status,
00440                        &pres->res_mkdir3.status,
00441                        NULL, NULL,
00442                        parent_pentry,
00443                        ppre_attr,
00444                        &(pres->res_mkdir3.MKDIR3res_u.resfail.dir_wcc),
00445                        NULL, NULL, NULL);
00446 
00447         return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00448 
00449 }
00450 
00459 void nfs_Mkdir_Free( nfs_res_t * resp ) 
00460 {
00461         if ((resp->res_mkdir3.status == NFS3_OK) &&
00462             (resp->res_mkdir3.MKDIR3res_u.resok.obj.handle_follows == TRUE))
00463           Mem_Free(resp->res_mkdir3.MKDIR3res_u.resok.obj.post_op_fh3_u.handle.data.data_val);
00464 } /* nfs_Mkdir_Free */
